ch.epfl.alpano.dem

Class ContinuousElevationModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.epfl.alpano.dem.ContinuousElevationModel

  • public final class ContinuousElevationModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Continuous elevations models (CEM) is an extension of a discrete elevation model (DEM). A CEM allows for the interpolation of values between the discrete values provided in a DEM. A CEM allows access to slope, and elevation at any point contained within the extent of the CEM.

    CEM use a linear interpolation approach to calculate values of the CEM based of the data provided by the DEM

    In the following doc "MNT" is used to refer to a

    Author:
    Martin Cibils (261746), Jeremy Mion (261178)
